title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.217 - On-duty use
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 262.217 - On-duty use

State Regulations

Each operator shall prohibit a covered employee from
using alcohol while performing covered functions. No operator having actual
knowledge that a covered employee is using alcohol while performing covered
functions shall permit the employee to perform or continue to perform covered
functions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
262.217

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
